Description: Pale-red pottery ostracon, from the body of a vessel, interior grooved, the exterior is very worn and only fragments of five lines of thick black-painted demotic text survive on the exterior.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (389769) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/389769)
Acquisition name: Purchased through: R J Moss & Co
